knimeNode.name: Annotate Regions
knimeNode.shortDescription: Used for converting BLAST results into a track for visualisation and further analysis

fullDescription.intro: Used for converting, for example BLAST results, into a track for visualisation and further analysis
fullDescription.option: Column to obtain accessions from (missing/empty values skipped)
Column to obtain sequences from (missing/empty values skipped)

inPort.name: Input sequences and regions of interest

ports.inPort: Data must include numerous columns for annotation (see configure)
